messages.content: I'm trying to study for my PDE exam and I'm really struggling with function spaces, I scored 89% overall on my last diagnostic but that one area is still giving me trouble, can you help me find some resources to understand it better, maybe something that explains it in the context of separation of variables, I'm planning to focus on Chapter 13 ->-> 1,2
